price: Walio kufuru na wakazuilia njia ya Mwenyezi Mungu, Yeye atavipotoa vitendo vyao.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: Walio mkataa Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake, na wakawazuilia watu wasiingie katika Uislamu, Mwenyezi Mungu amevivunja vyote walivyo vitenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
